note: He teaches an e-learning course on Ancient Rome for the Institute of Continuing Education at Cambridge University.
title: Philip Matyszak has a doctorate in Roman history from St. John’s College, Oxford, and is the author of Chronicle oj the Roman Republic, The Enemies oj Rome and The Sons of Caesar
